name: Garrison: Pet Menagerie
description:
Unlocks access to the Pet Menagerie.

Level 1
Attracts elite pets you can battle for rewards.  Also lets 5 of your battle pets hang out in your garrison.

Level 2
Increases your trap chance and reduces the cooldown of Revive Battle Pets while in Draenor.  Up to 10 of your pets can now hang out in your garrison.

Level 3
Unlocks a pet battle daily with unique pet rewards.
